name: Hare Egg
description:
short story mode ~15m 

Made in one week for Newgrounds July Jam.

My Twitter

You are the new employee of the Hare Productions. Your job? Paint eggs.

This game has:

  • Story Mode: Play through a small story where you must paint eggs by day, and draw propaganda for the revolution by night.
  • Arcade Mode: For the egg painting enthusiast, that believes that a story mode is just disrespecting the sport. Paint eggs as fast as you can and don't let the timer run out.
  • Paint Mode: Just painting. No goal or anything, you can just chill and paint some eggs. Maybe take some screenshots, idk.

Controls:

  • Left mouse button to paint.
  • In arcade mode you can use the 1, 2 and 3 on the keyboard to quickly change brushes.
